targets.expr: sum by (cluster,namespace) (kube_pod_container_resource_requests_cpu_cores{cluster=~"$cluster",namespace=~"$namespace"} unless on (pod) kube_pod_info{created_by_kind="Job"} unless on (pod) kube_pod_status_phase{phase="Failed"} == 1) * 1000

sum by (cluster,namespace) (kube_pod_container_resource_limits_cpu_cores{cluster=~"$cluster",namespace=~"$namespace"} unless on (pod) kube_pod_info{created_by_kind="Job"} unless on (pod) kube_pod_status_phase{phase="Failed"} == 1) * 1000

sum by (cluster,namespace) (kube_pod_container_resource_requests_memory_bytes{cluster=~"$cluster",namespace=~"$namespace"} unless on (pod) kube_pod_info{created_by_kind="Job"} unless on (pod) kube_pod_status_phase{phase="Failed"} == 1)

sum by (cluster,namespace) (kube_pod_container_resource_limits_memory_bytes{cluster=~"$cluster",namespace=~"$namespace"} unless on (pod) kube_pod_info{created_by_kind="Job"} unless on (pod) kube_pod_status_phase{phase="Failed"} == 1)
